articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets with IFRC President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets with IFRC President
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Tadateru Konoe, president of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday when they paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Kenya
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Kenya
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Uhuru Kenyatta, president of the Republic of Kenya, on the occasion of its 53rd independence day. 
					 The message expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Kenya would grow stronger in the mutual interests and wished the president of Kenya success in his work for the country's prosperity and people's well-being.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Nigerian Personage
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Nigerian Personage
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria.
					 Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria who doubles as co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, handed the gift to DPRK Ambassador to Nigeria Jong Yong Chol on Dec. 7.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troup Wraps up Its Tour Performance
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troup Wraps up Its Tour Performance
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Art Troup successfully ended its performance tour of local areas and performance in Pyongyang.
					 It drew down a curtain of its performance at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Monday.
					
					 The performance was enjoyed by Pyongyangites and students.
					
					 It began with music "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu".
					
					 Put on the stage were songs, dances, instrumental music and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the people's high pride and honor of being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation as they are guided by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, who is building a powerful socialist country of Juche by translating the wishes of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il into brilliant realities.
					
					 Female solo and chorus "Where Are You, Dear General?", an immortal classic, mesmerized the audience who miss very much Kim Jong Il who visited many units such as the Kumsong Foodstuff Factory, the Hana Musical Information Centre and Kwangbok Area Supermarket in the last year of his life for improving the standard of people's living.

articles.title: New Software and Book Enjoy Popularity in DPRK
articles.content:
New Software and Book Made Public in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Software "Munmyong (civilization)" and book "Houseplant Encyclopedia" made public by Kim Il Sung University won high appraisal at the recent 27th national exhibition of IT achievements in the DPRK.
					 "Munmyong" deals with over 1 500 species of world-famous flowers, divided into 9 chapters and 20 sections, in a comprehensive way ranging from the origin of their names to the world trend of their cultivation.
					
					 It gives photo-accompanied detailed answers to methods of their culture, propagation and distribution as well as their botanical names in Korean and Latin.
					
					 The book "Houseplant Encyclopedia" also carries full information and common knowledge about floriculture.
					
					 The software and book are highly appreciated by horticultural and floricultural stations and families.

articles.title: Peerlessly Great Men and Big Fish Hauls
articles.content:
Peerlessly Great Men and Big Fish Hauls
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- This year has witnessed big fish hauls in the DPRK. Whenever receiving the news about big fish hauls, the people in the DPRK have been recollecting with deep emotion the feats of leader Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to improving the standard of people's living.
					 In the last days of his life, Kim Jong Il put his autograph to a document on supplying fish to Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 Regarding it as his lifelong mission to fulfill the desire of Kim Jong Il, supreme leader Kim Jong Un has worked heart and soul to improve the work of the fisheries. He visited different fishing stations to usher in a new history of golden sea, saying that Kim Jong Il was deeply concerned for the issue of supplying fish to the people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Kim Jong Un saw to it that an annual meeting of officials and fishermen of fishery stations run by the Korean People's Army has been convened to congratulate them on their labor feats and give them official commendations, and thus encourage them to make bigger fish hauls.
					
					 Under his energetic leadership, the rich fish harvest has been gathered and its socialist flavour brought pleasure on servicepersons and people in the DPRK.

articles.title: People's Progressive Party of Nigeria Holds Kim Jong Il as Honorary National Leader
articles.content:
People's Progressive Party of Nigeria Holds Kim Jong Il as Honorary National Leader
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria held leader Kim Jong Il as honorary national leader in high esteem.
					A ceremony for conveying the certificate of the title of honorary national leader to him was held in Abuja on Dec. 7.
					
					Present at the ceremony were Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria who doubles as co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, members of the party leadership, DPRK Ambassador to Nigeria Jong Yong Chol and his embassy officials.
					
					The participants laid bunches of flowers before the picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria handed the certificate over to the DPRK ambassador.
					
					The national chairman said that Kim Jong Il performed immortal feats for building the party, the state and the army with the far-reaching intention to glorify socialist Korea.
					
					In particular, Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea founded by Kim Il Sung as the party of the leader loyal to him without any slightest stagnation and standstill and the party serving the people, the national chairman said, adding:
					
					It is the due obligation of all of us to award the title to Kim Jong Il.
					
					A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: Recent U.S. Congress "Resolution" on Reunion of Divided Families and Relatives of Korean Americans Blasted
articles.content:
Recent U.S. Congress "Resolution" on Reunion of Divided Families and Relatives of Korean Americans Blasted
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The international community is just perplexed over the U.S. sudden heated-up discussion on the issue of the divided families and relatives of Korean Americans.
					 Days ago U.S. Senate and House of Representatives separately passed a "resolution" calling on the DPRK to allow Korean Americans to reunite with their kinsmen in the north and to take "confidence-building measures" conducive to bringing peace to the Korean peninsula. 
					
					The adoption of the "resolution" was followed by such absurd comment that "a cornerstone is laid for the reunion of 100,000 Koreans living in the U.S." and "it is the wish of divided Korean families and relatives in the U.S."
					
					 This is nothing but a trick to cover up the criminal nature of the U.S. which spawned the issue of divided families and relatives of the Korean nation and stood in the way of their reunion and escalate the "human rights" campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 It is absolutely illogical for the U.S. to talk about the reunions of separated families and relatives of the Koreans.
					
					 The U.S. is the very one which is responsible for the division of Korea's territory and the issue of "divided families" of millions of Koreans through A-bomb scare.
					
					 Its illegal occupation of south Korea has left the Korean nation divided into the north and the south and the Korean war ignited by the U.S. made Korean kinsmen suffer from the misfortune and pain of division. This is the essence of the issue of divided families and relatives of Koreans.
					
					 This notwithstanding, the U.S., feigning ignorance of its unethical crimes, is trying to give impression that it is interested in the reunions of separated families and relatives of Koreans living in the U.S. and is "urging north Korea to allow them." This impudent act is provoking laughter.
					
					 The U.S. intends to escalate the new "human rights" campaign by taking issue with the humanitarian matter, an abuse of the kindred feelings of the divided families and relatives of Koreans in the U.S.
					
					 This is proven by the fact that the "resolution" is peppered with sinister contents faulting the DPRK and that envoy for the human rights issue in north Korea of the U.S. State Department Robert King, "human rights" trickster, has handled the issue of divided families and relatives of Korean Americans.
					
					 If the U.S. had neither hindered the implementation of the historic north-south declarations nor laid a stumbling block in the way of improving the north-south relations by instigating the puppet south Korean forces to escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, the wishes of divided families and relatives in the north, south and abroad for their reunions with their kinsmen might have come true long ago.
					
					 At a time when the reunions between divided families and relatives were under way, the U.S. frantically staged Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, spoiling the events.
					
					 At the instructions of the U.S., the south Korean puppet forces called for "refraining from pinning any hope on reunions of divided families and relatives because over-speed must be strictly banned". On the other hand, they kidnapped DPRK citizens in a sustained manner, deliberately producing new "divided families".
					
					 The reunions of divided families and relatives which had become a regular event at the positive measures and sincere efforts made by the DPRK have been suspended the blame for which entirely rests with the U.S. side.
					
					 If the U.S. is truly interested in the reunions of divided families and relatives, it has to immediately halt the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign aimed at estranging Koreans and inciting confrontation among them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Fully Implementing Kim Jong Il's Last Instructions
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Fully Implementing Kim Jong Il's Last Instructions
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday runs an editorial with the approach of the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 It is important to hold Kim Jong Il as the eternal leader in high esteem and take it as lifeline and principal line to implement his last instructions, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's behests are a textbook of the revolution and encyclopedia. 
					
					 They clearly indicate the goals and tasks which would serve as guidelines in all fields of the revolution and construction and ways for carrying them out, and a shortcut to building a socialist power.
					
					 The victorious advance of the Korean revolution is the materialization of the revolutionary way and work style of Kim Jong Il, and the best and strongest country we are building is the paradise for the people and an invincible power which fully embodied his idea and wishes.
					
					 His wishes are being translated into a reality thanks to the energetic leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The last instructions of Kim Jong Il are a science and truth, and fully implementing them guarantees victory in building a socialist power. This is the iron will of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We have iron will and pluck and the future of our country is brighter as there are the path of certain victory indicated by Kim Jong Il and strong political and military foundation and great potentiality of self-reliant economy and single-minded unity stronger than nukes that have been provided under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Final Victory
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Final Victory
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Snider, a researcher for the issues of the Korean peninsula at the U.S. Council of Foreign Relations, said in an article posted on a website that a regime change is now under way in the U.S. and there is no knowing of how long the political crisis caused by Park Geun Hye's corruption scandal will persist in south Korea, whereas the DPRK built a stable bulwark and is pursuing a clear-cut strategic goal under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This correctly reflects the reality of the DPRK, which has obtained the position of a dignified power even big powers dare not provoke.
					
					 Tragedy is that the U.S. is still daydreaming that it can deprive the DPRK of that position while persistently refusing to recognize its fundamentally changed strategic position.
					
					 Such calculation of the U.S. would get it nowhere. It would be well advised to face up to the reality and take actions.
					
					 Washington's persistent pursuance of its anachronistic one-sided policy hostile towards the DPRK with its ill-intended inveterate repugnancy toward it will only cause it to experience a hot agony of shame in face of the international community.
					
					 The DPRK will dash ahead like the wind to win the final victory, holding aloft the banner of Songun despite any sanctions and pressure of the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					 The world will witness a series of new measures to be taken by the DPRK in the days ahead that will terrify the enemies.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group for Begging for Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group for Begging for Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet minister of Foreign Affairs Yun Pyong Se during his recent junket to Austria talked such nonsense as "strong countermeasure of the international community against the north's nukes" and "close cooperation in implementing sanctions resolution". During his tour of an African country he behaved so meanly as to implore for "cooperation in implementing the sanctions resolution against the north" 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary terms this desperate efforts of the most wicked traitors who can subsist only by relying on outside forces and are steeped in ill-intended repugnancy toward the compatriots in the north and the wild ambition for confrontation to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The puppet group's such crazy bid is aimed to save their policy of confrontation from a total failure by relying on outside forces and seek a way out in doing harm to compatriots to the last.
					
					 As for Yun Pyong Se, he is no more than a dolt who took the lead in carrying out traitor Park Geun Hye's policy of confrontation with the DPRK and brought shame to the nation by playing the role of a running dog of Choe Sun Sil. 
					
					 It was thrice-cursed traitor Yun who conducted the humiliating and treacherous negotiations with the Japanese reactionaries as instructed by Park at which he glossed over the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army for a petty amount of money and it was again Yun who got more zealous than anybody else in working for THAAD deployment, claiming that this U.S. demand should be met under any circumstances. 
					
					 What matters is that the puppet group of traitors including Yun are getting frantic in their bid to escape a stern punishment, still trying hard to survive, and going mad with the confrontation with compatriots though their doom is fast approaching.
					
					 Only the most miserable end awaits those who are running the whole gamut of acts of treachery, counting on outside forces.

articles.title: Provocateurs Can Not Escape from Merciless Punishment: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Provocateurs Can Not Escape from Merciless Punishment: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The recent intensive artillery striking drill of the artillery units of the Korean People's Army on the front and the combat flight contest among commanding officers of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force-2016 were a stern warning to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group of traitors, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 Hostile forces have become undisguised in their violent politics, economic sanctions and blockade and military pressure under the pretext of the DPRK's measure to bolster up the nuclear deterrent, the just right for self-defense.
					
					 The puppet group of traitors is zealously joining in their master U.S. desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK. But, this is impossible.
					
					 The Korean People's Army, led by the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu as supreme commander, is a matchless elite army that is armed with striking means powerful enough to smash the bases of aggression and provocation in all theatres of operation including the sky and land, sea and underwater, possessed of the Juche-based war methods of certain victory.
					
					 Those who seek to do harm to the DPRK's dignity, sovereignty and right to existence even a bit can not escape from merciless punishment.
					
					 The arms of Mt. Paektu show no slightest mercy to the group of traitors. The army on a highest alert and the powerful striking means are waiting for a signal flare for final attack.
					
					 The doom of the puppet group of traitors is a matter of time and the Korean nation will greet the new day of the country's reunification in the near future.

articles.title: 7th All-People Actions against Park Geun Hye Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
7th All-People Actions against Park Geun Hye Launched in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The all-people actions against Park Geun Hye were launched again at more than 80 places in south Korea on Dec. 10 under the sponsorship of the Emergency People's Action for Ousting the Park Geun Hye Regime, according to reports.
					 1.04 million people took part in the candlelight actions.
					
					 The people held a meeting before Chongwadae till late at night to urge Park Geun Hye's resignation.
					
					 Such actions were also staged in Pusan, Kwangju, Taejon, Taegu and Jeju Island and other areas.

articles.title: S. Koreans Pledge to Fight It out Till Park Geun Hye Steps Down
articles.content:
S. Koreans Pledge to Fight It out Till Park Geun Hye Steps Down
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- South Korean people from all walks of life expressed the will to carry on their actions to oust Park Geun Hye from Chongwadae in the wake of the passage of the motion on the impeachment of her on Dec. 9, according to press reports from Seoul.
					Over 10,000 people gathered in front of the gate of the "National Assembly" and in the nearby street before the vote on the motion, and declared that candlelight action would go on even if the motion is carried.
					
					 The Emergency People's Action said the passage of the motion is the success made by the candlelight actions but it means just a beginning as it should cross a higher mountain by dint of the strength of the citizens.
					
					 Meanwhile, the former representative of the Minju Party demanded Park Geun Hye make a decision in line with the will of the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Religious Organizations Demand Decision of "Constitutional Court" Reflecting Public Mindset
articles.content:
S. Korean Religious Organizations Demand Decision of "Constitutional Court" Reflecting Public Mindset
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- In the wake of the passage of the motion on the impeachment of Park Geun Hye in the "National Assembly," religious bodies of south Korea demanded on Dec. 9 that the "constitutional court" make a decision for the people, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 The Emergency Measure Council of the south Korean Council of Christian Churches contended that the "court" should accept the decision of the "National Assembly" as soon as possible and thus reflect the will of the people.
					
					 The Buddhist Jogye Order in a commentary said that the passage of the motion means a stern judgment of the people and a historic product of the strength of the people.
					
					 It urged the "court" to make a historic judgment for the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Urge "Constitutional Court's" to Rapid Decision on Impeachment of Park
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Urge "Constitutional Court's" Rapid Decision on Impeachment of Park
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties of south Korea strongly demanded on Dec. 10 that the "constitutional court" make a speedy decision on the impeachment of Park Geun Hye, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 A spokesman for the Minju Party said that it would wage a sustained struggle by relying on the strength of the people to make the "court" rapidly decide to impeach Park, adding that the passage of the motion on her impeachment means the victory of the people.
					
					 A spokesman for the Kukmin Party, too, urged the "court" to make a prompt decision on her impeachment in reflection of the desire of the people.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Scandal Laid Bare Again
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Scandal Laid Bare Again
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Disclosed again was a fact that Park Geun Hye put pressure upon individuals who incurred her displeasure.
					 The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on December 8 received memorandum of Kim Yong Han who served as chief secretary for civil administration of Chongwadae before making public the fact.
					
					 According to the memorandum, Chongwadae prescribed to conservative organizations and media to negatively arouse public opinion on Pak Won Sun, mayor of Seoul, and Jo Hui Yon, education inspector of Seoul City.
					
					 The people of various social standings in south Korea expressed their resentment, saying that Park Geun Hye abused her power to eliminate the political opposition figures and keep watch the people and suppress them.

articles.title: Candlelight Rally Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Rally Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Movement Headquarters for Resignation of Park Geun Hye in south Korea held a candlelight rally for forcing her to step down in Taejon on December 9, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Speakers said that the passage of the bill on impeachment of Park Geun Hye was the decision of the angered people and the start of regaining victory of the people and democracy.
					
					 They said that the lawmakers who said no to her resignation had no qualifications and should step down from their posts.
					
					 They pointed out that the cabinet should be reshuffled.

articles.title: Vote on Motion on Impeachment of Park Geun Hye Is Just Start: S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Vote on Motion on Impeachment of Park Geun Hye Is Just Start: S. Korean Organization
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea issued a statement on Dec. 9, demanding that the whole Cabinet including Hwang Kyo An step down, owning the responsibility for all scandals. 
					 The Solidarity for Progress will carry on uninterrupted actions to immediately oust the Park regime irrespective of whether she is impeached or not, to have the "Saenuri Party" disbanded, force the whole cabinet to step down and make sure that the Park regime pays dearly for the deep-rooted evils it committed during the past four years including the ferry Sewol disaster and the murder of peasant Paek Nam Gi by "government" power, the statement said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Maritime Territorial committee of Russia for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on December 7.
					 Dolgachev, first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits on the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Figures of Indonesia, Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Figures of Indonesia, Myanmar
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Figures of Indonesia and Myanmar issued statements on December 5 and 6 on the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Ristiyanto, secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was a rare politician who performed immortal exploits before the era and history with his outstanding ideology and theory and extraordinary leadership and an iron-willed commander who turned the DPRK into a political and military power and nuclear weapons state by pursuing his original Songun politics.
					
					 He was a benevolent father of the people who kept their interests before anything and devoted his all to them till the last moments of his life.
					
					 We pay highest respect to Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people and the world progressive people, looking back upon his sacred revolutionary career.
					
					 Maung Maung Naying, director general of the Myit Tar Moe Publishing House of Myanmar, praised Kim Jong Il for demonstrating the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and inevitability of its victory through energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il firmly frustrated the reckless moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK by dint of Songun and reliably defended socialism and global peace and security.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Organizations and institutions of various countries posted special write-ups on their websites from Nov. 18 to Dec. 7 on the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of South Africa posted an article titled "Eternal leader of Korean people" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, the founding father of socialist Korea, and thus provided a guarantee for the Korean people to dynamically advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 It is the greatest exploits that he firmly defended Korean socialism.
					
					 He will be praised as the eternal leader of the Korean people.
					
					 Agence Congolaise d'Information posted various articles under the banner line "Whole life for people" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The articles praised him for deeming it his lifetime mission and greatest pleasure to devote himself to the people.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted articles praising Kim Jong Il for developing the revolutionary armed forces into an invincible army and firmly consolidating the single-minded unity of the whole society.
					
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo and the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK posted articles introducing his patriotic life for people.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by Nigerian Political Party
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by Nigerian Political Party
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria posted a special write-up on its website on Nov. 30 on the 5th anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Referring to the significance of the nuclear warhead explosion test successfully conducted by the DPRK in September last, the website noted:
					
					 The DPRK, which successfully conducted an underground nuclear test in October, 2006 to cope with the extreme and belligerent nuclear threat posed by the hostile forces, has steadily developed its nuclear technology.
					
					 The DPRK ranked itself among advanced nuclear powers with H-bomb by succeeding in its first H-bomb test in January this year.
					
					 It opened to public a miniaturized nuclear warhead and conducted a series of tests such as ground test of a high-power engine for a new-type ICBM, simulated test of ballistic rocket's atmospheric re-entry and test-fire of SLBM, demonstrating its tremendous nuclear attack capability.
					
					 By succeeding in the nuclear warhead explosion test, it finally confirmed the performance and power of the nuclear warhead standardized to be tipped on strategic ballistic rockets.
					
					 The standardization of the nuclear warhead made it possible for the DPRK to produce miniaturized, lighter and diversified nuclear warhead as many as it needs.
					
					 The nuclear technology of the DPRK has reached the highest level.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Tadateru Konoe y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Tadateru Konoe y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 12 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el presidente de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja, Tadateru Konoe, y su comitiva que le realizaron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam desea exitos al mandatario de Kenia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam desea exitos al mandatario de Kenia
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 12 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Kenia, Uhuru Muigai Kenyatta.
					El remitente expreso la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad existentes entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas conforme a los intereses mutuos y deseo exitos en las labores del destinatario por la prosperidad del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: ACNC comenta nuevo proyecto intrigante de "DDHH" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC comenta nuevo proyecto intrigante de "DDHH" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Ahora, la sociedad internacional se extrana de los Estados Unidos que habla tanto del problema del encuentro de los coreanos residentes en EE.UU. con sus familiares y parientes separados.
					Hace unos dias, el Senado y la Camara de Representantes del Congreso de EE.UU. aprobaron, respectivamente, el "proyecto de resolucion" que exige a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea permitir el encuentro de los coreanos residentes en EE.UU. con sus familiares y parientes en la RPDC y tomar las "medidas para establecer la confianza necesaria a la preservacion de la paz en la Peninsula Coreana".
					
					Luego, se escuchan en EE.UU. las voces ridiculas de que "fue preparada una base para el encuentro de los familiares separados de 100 mil coreanos residentes en EE.UU." y "es el deseo de los coreanos separados residentes en EE.UU."
					
					Esto no pasa de ser una artimana enganosa del pais norteamericano para encubrir su fachada criminal que produjo el problema de los familiares y parientes separados de la nacion coreana y vino impidiendo el encuentro de ellos, y para recrudecer mas la campana intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					Es una cosa absurda lo que EE.UU. habla del encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados de la nacion coreana.
					
					De veras, el pais norteamericano es el protagonista que dividio a Corea en dos partes y el autor que con el chantaje nuclear engendro el problema de los "familiares separados" de millones de coreanos.
					
					Debido a la ocupacion ilegal de EE.UU. al Sur de Corea, la nacion coreana se dividio en dos partes, y como resultado de la guerra coreana desatada por EE.UU., se separaron los familiares con mismo linaje sanguineo, lo que es la esencia del problema de los familiares y parientes separados.
					
					Sin embargo, dando vista gorda a sus crimenes antieticos, el imperio lanza los chismes tan absurdos como la "exigencia a la autorizacion" como si tuviera algun interes en el tema en cuestion. 
					
					Ahora, el pais norteamericano asecha aprovechar el problema humanitarismo abusando del sentimiento consanguineo de los familiares y parientes separados para recrudecer nueva campana intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					Lo comprueba el hecho de que el presente "proyecto" esta lleno de los contenidos denigrantes a la RPDC y Robert King, "enviado especial encargado de DDHH del Norte de Corea" del Departamento de Estado norteamericano, ha venido trabajando con el tema de encuentro de familiares y parientes separados de los coreanos en su pais. 
					
					Si EE.UU. no obstaculizo la ejecucion de las historicas declaraciones intercoreanas ni freno el mejoramiento de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas instigando a los titeres surcoreanos al enfrentamiento fratricida, se habria logrado ya el deseo de los familiares y parientes separados en el Norte, el Sur y el ultramar que aspiran ansiosamente el encuentro con sus sanguineos divididos.
					
					Al contrario, el pais norteamericano desarrollo los entrenamientos militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle cuando se efectuaba el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					De acuerdo con la orden de su amo norteamericano, los titeres surcoreanos insistieron en "contenerse en la esperanza en el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados, puesto que es danosa la velocidad excesiva de las relaciones intercoreanas". Y formaron intencionalmente nuevos "familiares separados" al cometer persistentemente el secuestro de los habitantes norcoreanos. 
					
					EE.UU. debe responsabilizarse totalmente de la suspension del encuentro de familiares y parientes separados que venia efectuandose normalmente gracias a las medidas iniciativas y los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC.
					
					Si tiene algun interes en el problema de encuentro de familiares y parientes separados, el pais norteamericano debe abolir inmediatamente la campana intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC que siembra la discordia entre ambas partes coreanas y fomenta la confrontacion fratricida.

articles.title: RPDC avanzara vertiginosamente hacia victoria final, subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
RPDC avanzara vertiginosamente hacia victoria final, subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, un investigador de los asuntos de la Peninsula Coreana del Consejo de Relaciones Exteriores de Estados Unidos, publico en una pagina Web un articulo de que en EE.UU. marcha la sustitucion del poder y en el Sur de Corea perdura la crisis politica causada por el escandalo politico de Park Geun-hye, mientras que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea persigue los claros objetivos estrategicos tras establecer el baluarte estable bajo la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					Esto es una evaluacion correcta sobre la realidad de la RPDC, subraya Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 12 y continua:
					
					La RPDC se ha convertido en una digna potencia a que ninguna potencia se atreve a tocar.
					
					Lamentablemente, el pais norteamericano no quiere reconocer todavia la cambiada posicion estrategica del pais socialista, sin liberarse de una ilusion de arrebatarla.
					
					Pero, su sueno es irrealizable. Seria mejor para el imperio que reconozca en serio la realidad.
					
					Si EE.UU. sigue insistiendo con el veto morboso en la invariable y anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC, esto le dara la mas gran ignominia internacional.
					
					Aun en medio de cualesquier sanciones y presiones de las fuerzas hostiles a la RPDC acaudilladas por EE.UU., el pais socialista avanzara a toda vela hacia la victoria final bajo la bandera de Songun.
					
					En el futuro, el mundo experimentara nuevas medidas de la RPDC, las cuales estremeceran a los enemigos.

articles.title: Partidos surcoreanos demandan la decision rapida sobre la dimision de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Partidos surcoreanos demandan la decision rapida sobre la dimision de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Segun la cadena surcoreana KBS, los partidos opositores del Sur de Corea demandaron fuertemente el dia 10 a la "Corte Constitucional" que tome pronto la decision sobre la dimision de Park Geun-hye.
					El portavoz del Partido Minju dijo que la aprobacion de la mocion de dimision de Park Geun-hye es la victoria del pueblo y agrego que luchara sin parar, apoyandose en las fuerzas del pueblo, para que la "Corte Constitucional" la ratifique pronto.
					
					El vocero del Partido Kukmin destaco que la "Corte Constitucional" debe decidir con prontitud el mismo tema aceptando el deseo del pueblo.
